item.title: Suggestions Around Building a Good Development Team in Parallel to Building a Good Product
item.description: I’m not a great programmer; I’m just a good programmer with great habits - Kent Beck. Behind any project there has to be a processes in place to build a culture of good coding habits for developers and a process to help “enforce” it. Without such a foundation in place the product will never result into a long term sustainable solution. Below are some items I would like to highlight that I believe can help make a solid application and grow a solid team.
